name: Byebye Flies
description:
If it doesn't work play the game here:https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/711731288/

This game was made for the "My First Game Jam: Summer 2022" Game jam.

The optional theme was "Heal". When you eat a fly you "heal" some of your hunger.

Instructions are in game.

Have fun!
